title: GraphQl Apollo Server
challenge: Create queries using GraphQl and Aollo Server
subTitle: Ideas & Concept
body: More than just a REST replacement, the graph is a unified representation of all your data, services, and digital capabilities. The graph enables app developers to delete thousands of lines of boilerplate code, move fast without waiting on backend teams, and keep features consistent across web and mobile platforms.

title: Big Block Customs Design
subTitle: Ideas & Concept
body: Bigblock Customs was born from a passion to evoke an emotional connection between a father and his child. Our toy cars are, therefore, much more than toys, they are dynamic tools for bonding and shared memories.

title: ATOM
subTitle: Ideas & Concept
body: ATOM is a bioelectric technology that accelerates natural healing. Client wanted modern tissues and connectors to bind medicine with new age technology. The geometry of this build combines design with medicine making it unique among other sites.

title: TBN Video On-Demand
challenge: UI/UX Design / Development for new platform
team:
TBN
Zack Anderson - UI Design and Development
service: Strategy, UI/UX Interaction, Web / Mobile Design
subTitle: Ideas & Concept
body: TBN Video on Demand is a free app that gives instant access to thousands of christian video assets. With over 2.4 MILLION users, the VOD web application serves many families.

title: Pet Grooming App
challenge: Design a Mobile App that allows users to create a profile, book/schedule services and checkout.
subTitle: Ideas & Concept
body: The pet grooming app allows users to easily create a profile for their pet, book/schedule services and pay for the service in 3 simple steps. The UI is designed to be simple, modern and playful.

title: Tau Leather
subTitle: Ideas & Concept
body: TAU Leather is a brand that designs, manufactures and sells globally appealing, handmade lifestyle leather products. We believe that people are at the core of our brand success, and therefore we primarily focus on uplifting South Africans by empowering and employing them.
